meanings.definition: A series of comments, explanations, or annotations on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading the commentaries in the newspaper to understand the news better.
meanings.sent2: The professor's commentaries on the ancient texts were insightful and informative.
meanings.sent3: The commentaries in the cookbook made me laugh with their quirky tips.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a soothing commentary on the chaos of the city streets.
meanings.sent5: The commentaries in the guidebook painted a vivid picture of the historical landmarks.

meanings.definition: A written work containing such comments or explanations.
meanings.sent1: The library had a section dedicated to historical commentaries on famous speeches.
meanings.sent2: She published her commentaries on the novel, offering a fresh perspective.
meanings.sent3: The commentaries in the magazine were so detailed, they felt like mini-stories.
meanings.sent4: His music was a beautiful commentary on the emotions of the human experience.
meanings.sent5: The commentaries in the textbook clarified complex concepts with simple examples.
